name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience specializing in building high-performance web applications. Proficient in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **Vue.js**, and **Angular**, I leverage a strong foundation in **Docker**, **Jenkins**, and **Gulp** to deliver scalable solutions. My background includes hands-on development using **NGinx** and integrating with enterprise applications such as **Veeva**, **Cvent**, and **Marketo**.  

Rich in analytical thinking, I excel in problem-solving and collaboration across cross-functional teams to achieve project milestones. My experience also encompasses modern tooling with innovative features including **AI-powered code completion** powered by **GitHub Copilot**, **Tabnine**, and the **JetBrains IDEs** which enhance development efficiency. I am committed to writing clean, maintainable code while adhering to compliance standards.

experience.responsibilities:

- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to accomplish project milestones, fostering an environment of analytical thinking and problem-solving.

• Leveraged **Docker** for containerization and **Jenkins** for CI/CD to streamline development processes, enhancing deployment frequency by **30%**.

• Developed and implemented AI/ML models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn** and **XGBoost**, proactively identifying suspicious transactions and reducing fraud incidents by **20%**.
• Automated ML pipelines for credit scoring and churn prediction with **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model insights for instantaneous decision-making capabilities across backend services.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), **Vue.js**, and **Angular** to design and develop dynamic, responsive web applications, ensuring a seamless user experience across various devices.
Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines using **Docker** and **Jenkins**, achieving a deployment frequency increase of **30%** while minimizing downtime through automated processes.
Implemented task automation using **Gulp** and optimization of web servers with **NGinx**, resulting in **20%** faster page load times and improved server response.
Executed features for marketing integrations with **Veeva**, **Cvent**, and **Marketo**, contributing to an optimized customer journey and enhanced lead generation strategies.
Engaged in analytical thinking and problem-solving to troubleshoot and resolve issues efficiently, facilitating improved collaboration among cross-functional teams.

Promoted effective communication within teams and stakeholders, ensuring project objectives and timelines were met on schedule.

Contributed to UX/UI design reviews to ensure that the applications align with both business goals and technical standards.
